text: Périgny is the name of several communes in France: * Périgny, Allier, in the Allier department * Périgny, Calvados, in the Calvados department * Périgny, Charente-Maritime, in the Charente-Maritime department * Périgny, Loir-et- Cher, in the Loir-et-Cher department * Périgny, Val-de-Marne, in the Val-de- Marne department * Périgny-la-Rose, in the Aube department == Other == * Perrigny
title: Périgny
